tags.name: if-diff
tags.description: An alternative to Polymer's dom-if element that allows comparison between two operands, as well as progressive enhancement.

attributes.name: if
attributes.description: Boolean property / attribute -- must be true to pass test(s)

attributes.name: equals
attributes.description: lhs must equal rhs to pass tests.

attributes.name: not_equals
attributes.description: lhs must not equal rhs to pass tests.

attributes.name: toggle_disabled
attributes.description: Toggle disabled attribute when test evaluation changes.

attributes.name: data-key-name
attributes.description: Name of dataset key to set to 1 if true and -1 if false, if dataset key is present

customEvents.name: value-changed
customEvents.description: Fires when evaluation of test changes

detail.name: value
detail.description: Indicates whether the comparison is satisfied.
